master.comparisonNetworkCoverage: \{comparisonChapter1Topic1Option1} - Yes — Search network and out-of-network doctors and providers
master.comparisonPcpRequirement: \{comparisonChapter1Topic2Option1} - Yes — you'll need to choose a PCP to help provide and coordinate your care
master.planDescription:
With this health plan, you’ll need to select a primary care physician (PCP) from our network. Your PCP will perform a key role in guiding your health care by helping you avoid duplicating tests and services, connecting you with a specialist if needed, and supporting you in achieving your best health. You can select Tier 1 providers to help you get the most from of your benefits. Tier 1 providers are doctors, specialists, and other health care facilities recognized for value in health care delivery. 

 

There is no coverage if you use an out-of-network provider or if you see a specialist without an online referral from your PCP.  

 

Preventive care is covered 100 percent in the network. You don't have to pay any out-of-pocket costs for age appropriate preventive care as long as you use a network doctor.
master.planDetailPagePrimaryCarePhysicianTopic1: \{planDetailPagePrimaryCarePhysicianTopic1Option1} - With this plan, you'll need to select a primary care physician (PCP)
master.summaryCopays: \{summaryTopic3Option1} - Copay due for certain services, prescriptions and locations
master.summaryNetworkCoverage: \{summaryTopic1Option1} - Both network and out-of-network providers covered
